geekshop.controller

Class OwnerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • geekshop.controller.OwnerController

  • @Controller
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasRole(\'ROLE_OWNER\')")
class OwnerController
extends java.lang.Object
    A Spring MVC controller to manage the shop owner's functions.
    Author:
    Felix Döring, Sebastian Döring, Dominik Lauck

        Parameters:

      • acceptReclaim

        @RequestMapping(value="/showreclaim/{rid}",
                method=DELETE)
public java.lang.String acceptReclaim(@PathVariable(value="rid")
                                                                                                                   org.salespointframework.order.OrderIdentifier reclaimId,
                                                                                                                   @RequestParam(value="msgId")
                                                                                                                   java.lang.Long msgId,
                                                                                                                   @RequestParam(value="accept")
                                                                                                                   java.lang.Boolean accept)
        Accepts or declines the open GSOrder with OrderType RECLAIM and close it. Deletes the message.
        Parameters:
        reclaimId - the OrderIdentifier from the Order
        msgId - the Id of the Message
        accept - boolean value if the reclaim is accepted
        Returns:
